title: Greg Gisbert Sextet 1996 On Second Thought
description: Greg Gisbert Sextet ~ On Second Thought ~ 1996 Criss Cross Jazz 1116 CD. http://i4.imageban.ru/out/2017/06/17/ceff8f4892c6256630d1eacdc2bb13d0.jpg 1. Chapulta Walk 8:45 2. The Green Dress 9:24 3. Fingers 9:12 4. On Second Thought 7:15 5. Effendi 8:35 6. Segment 9:35 7. Played Twice 8:16 Greg Gisbert: trumpet, flugelhorn Chris Potter: tenor saxophone Steve Wilson: alto saxophone John Campbell: piano Peter Washington: bass Billy Drummond: drums Trumpeter Greg Gisbert is not quite as well known as his sidemen, but he keeps up with them during this advanced hard bop date. The highlights include the original medium-tempo blues "Chapulta Walk," a revival of Thad Jones' "Fingers" (a romp over rhythm changes) with Gisbert being effective on muted trumpet, and tenor saxophonist Chris Potter really cutting loose and eating up the chord changes on Charlie Parker's "Segment" and Thelonious Monk's "Played Twice." All of the musicians play at their expected high levels, with altoist Steve Wilson and pianist John Campbell also having their strong moments. This set is easily recommended to fans of modern straight-ahead jazz. - Scott Yanow, AMG
